turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Good morning!  My name is Jenny.  I'm in Florida.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: good morning ., my name is shifa . I'm in houstan

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Cool!  I was happy to see a $2 HIT first thing in the morning; I always feel like it's going to be a good day when I get lucky with a big HIT.  I don't usually have much time to put into Mturk each day.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Yes, even i got so excited after getting a 2$ HiT . Usually i only get 0.10$ HiT

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: I try to earn a little extra each morning; it eventually adds up to a dinner out or a new outfit.  Sometimes I use my earnings for charity.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Yes its really helps me as well in my few expenses.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Have you ever done one of those HITs where they ask you to donate to charity?  Sometimes I feel like I should do it since I'm lucky enough to get to do these HITs, but sometimes I feel like keeping it all myself.  Usually, though, I do donate.  Do you?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: yes lately i"ve been getting such HItS and i\'ve completed those nd yes i donated to the charity .

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Do you have a favorite charity?  The researchers in this HIT have told me (in my directions on the left of this screen) that we should consider donating some of our earnings to charity.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: No not in particular.There are no search directions given to me and i can't even find anything on the left side of the screen

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Oh!  I guess because I was the one who had to initiate the conversation, they gave me some directions to talk about.  They suggest we consider donating part of our earnings to Save the Children.  I'm thinking about donating $.50 of my $2.  It seems like a good organization; have you heard of them?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: oh! I wonder why no directions have been given to me, and i haven't heard anything about this organization yet. ye! sounds goo

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: It's an international organization that helps support children (health, education, safety) in developing countries.  I think I've seen commercials on TV for them, too.  I know they've been around for a while, so I trust that it's a good organization.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Please can you help me with the name of the organization ?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: It's called Save the Children.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: oh! So How many HITs do you complete in a day?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: I try to earn $3 a day on mTurk--some days that only takes a couple of HITs, other days it's takes a lot longer.  If I can get $20/week extra, I feel like it was a good week.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Why don't they give us HITs of 1$ or 2$ everyday? If this happen i will be so happy

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Yes!  Well, I think we're getting near the end of this one.  Would you like to donate .50 to Save the Children?  If we both do it, it will still give us 1.50 each and our combined $1 will help feed a child in another country.  Charities like this can make our $1 go a long way.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Yes that sounds great. I had a good time chatting with you

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Thank you!  The researchers assure me that they'll take care of the donation.  So, you're in agreement--we'll each donate 50 cents to Save the Children?  If so, then we can end this chat/HIT!  Thank you.  It was fun.
